traditionalLearning.title: Traditional Learning
traditionalLearning.description: Master concepts with targeted practice questions.

config.pageDescription: Select the sections and topics you want to practice. Customize your session to focus on specific areas.
config.sectionsDescription: Select from the main and sub-sections.
config.starredDescription: Practice only the questions you have marked with a star.
config.notMasteredDescription: Focus on questions from skills you haven't mastered yet.

validation.atLeastOneSubsection: Please select at least one subsection to begin.
validation.numQuestionsMin: Number of questions must be at least 1.
validation.numQuestionsMax: Number of questions must not exceed 50.

api.startSuccess: Practice session started successfully! Good luck!
api.startError: Failed to start practice session. Please try again.

list.noAttemptsDescription: Your practice sessions will appear here once you start one. Use the form above to begin!

actions.abandonedTooltip: This test was abandoned, and you can't review it

cancelDialog.title: Are you sure you want to cancel this session?
cancelDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. Your progress in practice session #{attemptId} will be lost.
cancelDialog.successToast: Practice session #{attemptId} has been successfully cancelled.
cancelDialog.errorToastGeneric: Could not cancel the session. Please try again.

errors.fetchFailedDescription: An error occurred while loading your practice sessions. Please try again later.

session.title: Practice Session
session.question: Question
session.noMoreQuestions: You've completed all the questions in this session!
session.confirmEndDescription: Are you sure you want to end this session? Your progress will be saved.

api.hintNotAvailable: No hint available for this question.
api.explanationNotAvailable: No explanation available for this question.

errors.fetchReviewFailed: Failed to load practice session results. The session might be incomplete or an error occurred.

review.noQuestionsInReview: There are no questions available in this practice session review.
review.noQuestionsMatchFilter: No questions match the current filter.

errors.fetchReviewFailed: Could not load the practice session review. Please try again or go back.
